data.title: CROATIAN RADIO TELEVISION America
data.text:
HRT-America

www.hrt-america.com

HRT-Australia

www.hrt-australia.com

PICTURE OF CROATIA is the North American television broadcast of Croatian Radio and Television, HRT (Hrvatska Radiotelevizija), the national public broadcaster of the Republic of Croatia. Picture of Croatia offers information on Croatian history, culture, and heritage as

well as news, sports and entertainment programs of interest to Croatians living abroad.

The channel consists of an 8-hour block of original programming broadcasted from 8pm to 4am ET (5pm to 1am PT) followed by two rebroadcasts of the initial 8-hours block.

Picture of Croatia offers American viewers the latest daily entertainment as broadcasted in Croatia, including a 30-minute news bulletin from TV DNEVNIK to keep you informed on the current events in Croatia and the world.

VOICE OF CROATIA is Picture of Croatia's full-time companion international radio channel, which replaces HR International. Voice of Croatia is specifically for the Croatian population living abroad. Focusing on social, economic and cultural issues, Voice of Croatia keeps

listeners informed about current events and culture events back home.

For more information, visit www.hrt.hr or contact us at:

Experience the Croatia of today by subscribing to HRT's Picture of Croatia and Voice of Croatia - your direct link with Croatia - now available in North America as Pay TV.

For $15.99 US dollars a month, HRT's Picture of Croatia and Voice of Croatia comes directly to your home via satellite. All you need is a GlobeCast WorldTV satellite system, including a satellite dish, a satellite receiver and an authorized smartcard to decode the Television & Radio progam.
